skill.name: Chameleon
skill.normal: Increases the time until you start getting detected while in casing mode by 25%. You can also mark enemies while in casing mode.
skill.ace: You can pick up items while in casing mode. You also gain 30% more value to items and cash that you pick up.

skill.name: Cleaner
skill.normal: You gain 1 additional body bag in your inventory and you gain the ability to carry 1 more body bag in addition to the gained body bag.
skill.ace: You gain the ability to place 2 body bag cases.

skill.name: Chameleon
skill.normal: You gain the ability to automatically mark enemies within a 10 meter radius around you after standing still for 3.5 seconds while in stealth.
skill.ace: You gain access to all insider assets. Cleaning costs after killing a civilian is reduced by 75%.

skill.name: Nimble
skill.normal: You gain the ability to loop 1 camera for 25 seconds, temporarily disabling it from detecting you and your crew.
skill.ace: You lockpick 50% faster. You gain the ability to lockpick safes.

skill.name: ECM Overdrive
skill.normal: Your ECM jammer and feedback duration is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: Your ECM jammer can now also be used to open certain electronic doors.

skill.name: ECM Specialist
skill.normal: You can now place 2 ECM jammers instead of just one.
skill.ace: The ECM jammer duration is increased by 25% and the ECM feedback duration lasts 25% longer. The ECM jammer now delays the pagers.

skill.name: Duck and Cover
skill.normal: The time before stamina regeneration starts is reduced by 25% and the regeneration of stamina is increased by 25%. You also sprint 25% faster.
skill.ace: You have a 10% increased chance of dodging enemy fire while sprinting. You gain 15% dodge while ziplining,

skill.name: Parkour
skill.normal: You gain 10% additional movement speed and 20% ladder climbing speed.
skill.ace: You can now sprint while strafing.

skill.name: Inner Pockets
skill.ace: Increases all of your ballistic vests' concealment by 4.

skill.name: Dire Need
skill.normal: When your armor is depleted, the first shot on any enemies will cause those enemies to stagger. This effect ends when your armor regenerates.
skill.ace: This effect persists for 6 seconds after your armor has regenerated.

skill.name: Shockproof
skill.normal: The taser's shock attack has a 30% chance to backfire, knocking back the taser.
skill.ace: When tased you are able to free yourself by pressing [INTERACT] within 2 seconds of getting tased.

skill.name: Sneaky Bastard
skill.normal: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 10%.
skill.ace: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 10%.

skill.name: Second Wind
skill.normal: When your armor breaks your movement speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds.
skill.ace: This effect alos applies to your crew when triggered.

skill.name: Optic Illusions
skill.normal: You are 45% less likely to be targeted by enemies.
skill.ace: You gain 1 concealment for each silenced weapon you have equipped. Reduces concealment penalty of silencers by 2.

skill.name: The Professional
skill.normal: You gain 8 weapon stability and 100% snap to zoom increase with silenced weapons.
skill.ace: You gain 12 weapon accuracy with silenced weapons.

skill.name: Low Blow
skill.normal: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 30%.
skill.ace: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 30%.

skill.name: Specialized Killing
skill.normal: You deal 15% more damage with all silenced weapons.
skill.ace: You deal an additional 15% more damage with all silenced weapons.

skill.name: Unseen Strike
skill.normal: If you do not lose any armour or health for 4 seconds you gain a 35% critical hit chance for 6 seconds.
skill.ace: The critical hit chance duration is increased by 18 seconds.
